name: CategoryTheory.sum.associator_obj_inl_inl
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
D : Type u
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} D
E : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} E
X : C
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.sum.associator C D E).obj (Sum.inl (Sum.inl X))) (Sum.inl X)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem associator_obj_inl_inl (X) : (associator C D E).obj (inl (inl X)) = inl X :=
  rfl

name: CategoryTheory.sum.associativity_inverse
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
D : Type u
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} D
E : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} E
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.sum.associativity C D E).inverse (CategoryTheory.sum.inverseAssociator C D E)
decl:
/-- The equivalence of categories expressing associativity of sums of categories.
-/
@[simps functor inverse]
def associativity : (C ⊕ D) ⊕ E ≌ C ⊕ (D ⊕ E) where
  functor := associator C D E
  inverse := inverseAssociator C D E
  unitIso := NatIso.ofComponents (by rintro ((_ | _) | _) <;> exact Iso.refl _) (by
    rintro ((_ | _) | _) ((_ | _) | _) f <;> first | cases f | aesop_cat)
  counitIso := NatIso.ofComponents (by rintro (_ | (_ | _)) <;> exact Iso.refl _) (by
    rintro (_ | (_ | _)) (_ | (_ | _)) f <;> first | cases f | aesop_cat)

name: CategoryTheory.sum.associativity_functor
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
D : Type u
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} D
E : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} E
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.sum.associativity C D E).functor (CategoryTheory.sum.associator C D E)
decl:
/-- The equivalence of categories expressing associativity of sums of categories.
-/
@[simps functor inverse]
def associativity : (C ⊕ D) ⊕ E ≌ C ⊕ (D ⊕ E) where
  functor := associator C D E
  inverse := inverseAssociator C D E
  unitIso := NatIso.ofComponents (by rintro ((_ | _) | _) <;> exact Iso.refl _) (by
    rintro ((_ | _) | _) ((_ | _) | _) f <;> first | cases f | aesop_cat)
  counitIso := NatIso.ofComponents (by rintro (_ | (_ | _)) <;> exact Iso.refl _) (by
    rintro (_ | (_ | _)) (_ | (_ | _)) f <;> first | cases f | aesop_cat)

name: CategoryTheory.sum.associatorIsEquivalence
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
D : Type u
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} D
E : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} E
⊢ (CategoryTheory.sum.associator C D E).IsEquivalence
decl:
instance associatorIsEquivalence : (associator C D E).IsEquivalence :=
  (by infer_instance : (associativity C D E).functor.IsEquivalence)

name: CategoryTheory.sum.inverseAssociatorIsEquivalence
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
D : Type u
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} D
E : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} E
⊢ (CategoryTheory.sum.inverseAssociator C D E).IsEquivalence
decl:
instance inverseAssociatorIsEquivalence : (inverseAssociator C D E).IsEquivalence :=
  (by infer_instance : (associativity C D E).inverse.IsEquivalence)
